Text.Value: You will become a Dark Justiciar, blessed with my power. You will become my voice to those who embrace me. And you will be my sword arm against those who would do me harm.
Nothing that you are not more than capable of - the punishing of a wicked Sel没nite. All you have to do is use the spear to end her light.
No, Shadowheart. The spear is key. Retrieve it, so that I may embrace you.
Look to the library. It houses more than just knowledge.
She is a test of your loyalty. When you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.
You deserve this, Shadowheart, above all others. I wish all my followers had your spirit. Now onwards - warm my blade with the Sel没nite's blood.
When you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.
The final threshold. You made it, Shadowheart - just as I knew you would. Now all you must do is step forwards, and the rest will prove simple.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart kneels before the pool and bows her head reverentially as Shar's voice begins to speak to her telepathically

Text.Value: As you command, Nightsinger.
I have no need of the spear.
Listen.
What do you need of me, my Lady?
I believe in you, Shadowheart. Wield the spear and receive your reward.
Take my spear, step forward, and strike down the Sel没nite who awaits beyond.
I'm not sure I can continue.
Listen.
I can't do this.
As you command, Nightsinger.
A Sel没nite sacrifice awaits beyond - but you must not approach her without the spear. Find it and wield it before you take another step.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart kneels before the pool and bows her head reverentially as Shar's voice begins to speak to her telepathically

Text.Value: Such glory, for one life? Why is this one so important, my Lady?
What do you need of me, my Lady?
I know you will. Your faith is true, and when you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.
Do not shame me with your doubts, child. I know your heart - your faith is true. When you strike this blow, a cleansing of my church will be unleashed, with you as my instrument.
You can. I believe in you - now believe in yourself. Take my spear, step forward, and strike down the Sel没nite who awaits beyond.
I will do as you ask, Lady Shar.

Synopsis:
Spear AOM/OOM: Shar reveals the final step to Shadowheart. She must kill the Selunite, Nightsong, and rise as Shar's loyal servant. 
No spear AOM: Shar reminds Shadowheart to find the spear. The player (as SH) can choose whether or not to find the spear, and can enter the Shadowfell without the spear
No spear OOM: Shar reminds Shadowheart to get the spear.
